metadata.title: CVE-2021-31873 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in klibc before 2.0.9. Additions in the malloc() function may result in an integer overflow and a subsequent heap buffer overflow.

notes.note: mdeslaur> only used in initramfs, doesn't parse untrusted data

criterions.comment: klibc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
